name: cooltipz-css
description: Cooltipz.css is a pure CSS tooltip library that is lightweight, modern, accessible, customisable and easy to use

scripts.build: stylelint "**/*.scss" --fix && sass --no-source-map src/cooltipz.scss ./cooltipz.min.css --style=compressed && sass --no-source-map src/cooltipz.scss ./cooltipz.css --style=expanded && npx postcss cooltipz.min.css --use autoprefixer cssnano --replace --no-map && npx postcss cooltipz.css --use autoprefixer --replace --no-map
scripts.prerelease: npm i && npm audit fix && npm run build
